name: Bradley the Bold
description:
You are following the journey of a child named Bradley. His father died many years ago and it made his mother, Sarah, very sad. Time has passed and the wound has healed, she has found a new man to be her husband. Bradley suspects that this new man in his life, who calls himself Dr. David Daniels, is actually a terrible person who doesn't deserve his mother. Your job is to help Bradley find evidence that will convince your mother what that evil man is truly made of!

The game was made over the course of 24 weeks as a Senior Project with the intent of capturing a detective noir feel with a hint of "Leave it to Beaver" in the way it is presented. Inspirations for the game initially came from other games such as L.A. Noire, Hello Neighbor, and Jenny LeClue - Detectivu.

Controls:

Mouse movement to shift camera

WADS to move character

E to interact

J to open Journal

R to rest for the night
